QuestData.Title: Trouble Brewing
QuestData.Description: Lots of yetis in Kota, yup. Usually not too dangerous. Usually just eat goots.$B$BThen they ate the goots full of kafa...$B$B<Keenbean shoots Gootfur a mean glance.>$B$BNow they're moody, cranky, sleep a lot but never seem rested. Typical kafa addicts.$B$BGonna come outta those caves soon, I'm sure. Come lookin' for more kafa.$B$BThen we all in trouble.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Kafa-Crazed Yetis in the caves on Kota Peak.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't wanna fight yetis? Can't say I blame you.
QuestData.RewardText: You made it!$B$BYeti's are tough enough on their own - can't imagine what a cranky kafa-addict yeti must be like. You brave. Or lucky. Or dumb.$B$BMaybe all three.
